title: Oceanic University Championship Brackets and schedules!
body:
Brackets and Schedules are live, Remyrhe Gaming is running the tournaments for NZ, VIC, SA, NT, TAS and OCE Weekly for ACT, QLD, WA, NSW.

You can find the brackets for [Remyrhe here](https://www.facebook.com/RemyrheGaming/posts/873522672728675?__mref=message_bubble)

You can find the brackets for [OCE Weekly here](https://www.facebook.com/events/420708344799250/)

replies.body: will there be future announcement for registration of uni competitions? Since most of us did not know this is under going
We did announce this and have it in client at the time. But of course all future events will be announced too =)
Will there be future Uni competitions to look out for? Withheld on playing thinking there'd be better players (Slightly egotistical, but I'm not alone).

Hey Jess,

We are currently deciding what we should do next year for OCE Universities. Let me know if you have any cool ideas!

Just an idea. As a uni student playing in that competition, I found it really enjoyable especially with the team ranked and the feeling that you are vsing other uni students like yourself. One thing which would be cool if these things were more frequent or lasted longer (If I am wrong and there are more competitions like this send me a link). So my idea is that the universities could have their own little LSC style tournament which would last a month or two, maybe even longer. I feel it could be  a bit complicated to do with heaps of teams wanting to enter so maybe limit 1 team per Uni. But I can imagine how cool it would be to play more games against other universities. But it's just an idea. {{summoner:31}}  {{champion:17}}
More competition within unis and between other unis sounds like a cool idea! Thanks for your feedback
Hey it says the games start at  1:00 PM GMT +10:00 , can you tell us what time it starts AEST? As far as I understand does it start at 9am?

Hey ,

If you contact the relevant tournament organiser they will be able to answer your questions

there are no times listed as too when we start each round/game, can you confirm what times each round starts?

and also, how do we find our seedings for the tournament?

Hey ,

If you contact the relevant tournament organiser they will be able to answer your questions
